scripts.scraper: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev node src/scraper/index.js | pino-pretty -i pid,hostname -t yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:ss
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev node src/index.js | pino-pretty -i pid,hostname -t yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:ss
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev node src/index.js | pino-pretty -i pid,hostname -t yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:ss
scripts.api: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev node src/api/index.js | pino-pretty -i pid,hostname -t yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:ss
